resources.string: We were unable to hard reset the device.
The software on your phone is too old for an automatic update. Please contact your mobile operator to update the software on your phone.
This is a development device and will hard reset when you press OK. Non-development devices will just reset.
There was an error signing into your account. \n \n Your MOTOBLUR account has been disabled. Please contact customer service.
The password on your account does not match the one we have stored. If you recently changed your password, please re-enter the new password now.
Your account has been deleted. Please reset your device to create a new account. Please go to \"Settings\" then \"SD card & storage\" and select \"Factory data reset\"
The account you are using is associated with another device. Please contact customer service to reset the device.
Privacy policies for use of Google and Android services can be found under Settings/About phone/Legal information/Google legal.
